name: melanBararan
description:
■ Burn and Destroy for Stress Relief!



Don't overthink it—just destroy all the walls in front of you and move forward! Break it all down from the foundation and watch it crumble!

■ Huge and Moving! Huge is romance!



Gigantic fortresses resembling various creatures walk, break walls, and advance! Break wings, shatter legs, and destroy different parts!

■ Help Allies for Fever Time!



Borrow the friendship power of the allies you've helped to easily break even the toughest iron walls!

■ Wagging Tails! Plump Bellies! Big Eyes!


For those who love emotionally expressive and cute animal characters,
Allies captured by Onbu are calling for your help!

System Minimum Requirements

Minimum:
OS *: Windows 10
Processor: Core i5-10500
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
